title: Natural triterpenoid-aided identification of the druggable interface of HMGB1 occupied by TLR4
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, 5,751-762
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00062E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Pingping Shen, Xuewa Jiang, Yi Kuang, Weiwei Wang, Richa Raj, Wei Wang, Yuyuan Zhu, Xiaochun Zhang, Boyang Yu, Jian Zhang
Using the unique triterpenoid probe, we found that the binding interface of HMGB1 was responsible for the recognition of TLR4 located on the “L” shaped B-box with K114 as a crucial hot-spot residue.
